      Methods in org.sakaiproject.authz.api that return SecurityAdvisor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SecurityAdvisor SecurityService.popAdvisor()
      Deprecated. 
      for safety use SecurityService.popAdvisor(SecurityAdvisor) to ensure you remove the correct advisor
      SecurityAdvisor SecurityService.popAdvisor(SecurityAdvisor advisor)
      Remove the designated SecurityAdvisor from the top of the Stack
      Methods in org.sakaiproject.authz.api with parameters of type SecurityAdvisor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SecurityAdvisor SecurityService.popAdvisor(SecurityAdvisor advisor)
      Remove the designated SecurityAdvisor from the top of the Stack
      void SecurityService.pushAdvisor(SecurityAdvisor advisor)
      Establish a new SecurityAdvisor for this thread, at the top of the stack (it gets first dibs on the answer).
